parts.title: Task 1: Listen and choose the correct answer for questions 1-13.

data.question: 1. What is not original?

data.question: 2. Why did he decide to travel for 2 years?

parts.title: Task 5: Listen to someone talking about a book about a life of a scientist and answer the questions.

data.question: 1. Why is the book so popular?
options: It uses simple language to describe complex ideas
It was written by a famous author
data.answer: It uses simple language to describe complex ideas

data.question: 2. What do people criticize about the book?
options: It is similar to the previous book about the scientist
It is too long and complicated
data.answer: It is similar to the previous book about the scientist

They both write in the same genre

data.question: 2. What is special about their works?
options: The meaning of their work is not always easily identified
Their works often have a political message
data.answer: The meaning of their work is not always easily identified
